What Kind Of Payments Do We Accept

We accept Cash, Credit Card, and Debit Card payments.

Will I have to show my ID when I receive my order?

When you arrive at our store, every person must show their ID regardless of age, in order to prove that they are 19+ and can legally purchase cannabis in Ontario. Weâ€™re sorry but there are no exceptions to this rule.
